body_html:
The conda package for PyTorch 0.3.0 is out. Try installing using the following commands:

# for Windows 10 and Windows Server 2016, CUDA 8
conda install -c peterjc123 pytorch cuda80

# for Windows 10 and Windows Server 2016, CUDA 9
conda install -c peterjc123 pytorch cuda90

# for Windows 7/8/8.1 and Windows Server 2008/2012, CUDA 8
conda install -c peterjc123 pytorch_legacy cuda80

Note that the support for sm_20 has been dropped, so some old cards can't use PyTorch any more.

body:
The conda package for PyTorch 0.3.0 is out. Try installing using the following commands:
```Powershell
# for Windows 10 and Windows Server 2016, CUDA 8
conda install -c peterjc123 pytorch cuda80

# for Windows 10 and Windows Server 2016, CUDA 9
conda install -c peterjc123 pytorch cuda90

# for Windows 7/8/8.1 and Windows Server 2008/2012, CUDA 8
conda install -c peterjc123 pytorch_legacy cuda80
```
Note that the support for `sm_20` has been dropped, so some old cards can't use PyTorch any more.
